text: The 2015 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 5–9 at the Times Union Center in Albany, New York. The winner of the tournament, Manhattan, received the conference's automatic bid into the 2015 NCAA Tournament. ==Seeds== {| class="wikitable" style="white- space:nowrap; font-size:95%;text-align:center" !Seed !School !Conference !Tiebreaker !Tiebreaker 2 |- | 1 || align=left|Iona ‡† || 17–3 || || |- | 2 || align=left|Rider † || 15–5 || || |- | 3 || align=left|Manhattan † || 13–7 || 2–0 vs Monmouth || |- | 4 || align=left|Monmouth † || 13–7 || 0–2 vs Manhattan || |- | 5 || align=left|Canisius † || 11–9 || || |- | 6 || align=left|Quinnipiac || 9–11 || || |- | 7 || align=left|St. Peter's || 8–12 || || |- | 8 || align=left|Siena || 7–13 || 2–0 vs Niagara || |- | 9 || align=left|Niagara || 7–13 || 0–2 vs Siena || |- | 10 || align=left|Fairfield || 5–15 || 1–1 vs Marist || 1–3 vs Manh/Monm |- | 11 || align=left|Marist || 5–15 || 1–1 vs Fairfield || 0–4 vs Manh/Monm |- | colspan=5 align=left|‡ – MAAC regular season champions. † – Received a bye in the conference tournament. |} ==Bracket== ==References== Category:MAAC Men's Basketball Tournament Category:Sports in Albany, New York Category:2014–15 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference men's basketball season MAAC Men's Basketball
title: 2015 MAAC Men's Basketball Tournament
